name: Sun Spear
description:
Gather your courage and stand against the endless night. The seal holding back The Beast has been broken, the Sun Pillars that once powered it lie mysteriously dormant. Unless they are restored by sundown, there will be nothing to stop The Beast from enacting its revenge on mankind. Journey through the desert lands and vanquish creatures twisted and distorted by shadow to end this years-old battle once and for all.

Sun Spear emphasizes satisfying, quick-paced combat. Keep hoards of shadowed enemies at bay with the Sun Spear's ranged strikes and call upon the power of the light for devastating close-range attacks. Defeat your enemies quick- every attack blights the terrain around you.
